meanings.definition: Marked or imprinted by hand with a stamp.
meanings.sent1: The handstamped letter looked unique among the printed ones.
meanings.sent2: She cherished the handstamped bracelet as a special gift.
meanings.sent3: The handstamped cookies had a personal touch that made them extra delightful.
meanings.sent4: Her handstamped signature on the painting added a personal flair.
meanings.sent5: The handstamped logo on the bag made it stand out from the rest.

meanings.definition: The act of stamping by hand.
meanings.sent1: The handstamped of approval made her smile.
meanings.sent2: He enjoyed the handstamped process of creating unique cards.
meanings.sent3: The handstamped on the passport made him feel official.
meanings.sent4: The handstamped on the document indicated its authenticity.
meanings.sent5: The handstamped on the envelope showed it was ready to be sent.
